intro.description: To access a Notes database using the local client, it is recommended to deactivate the login dialog for applications accessing databases. Otherwise, the user has to login again when starting the application, which is not possible when the application is running on a server.

item.title: Open Notes client
item.description: Open your local Notes client, if not already done.

item.title: Customize User Security settings
item.description: In the main window select File > Security > User Security .... Enter your password and select the option "Don't prompt for a password from other Notes-based programs (reduces security)"
